toolsMCP.description: DSO Tools with documentation and articles about Dynamic Shared Ownership at Bayer
toolsMCP.name: DSO GO MCP
toolsMCP.usage_hint: Use it when you want more infor about DSO

toolsMCP.description: Search FDA product labels for detailed drug labeling information including clinical pharmacology, dosage, warnings, and contraindications.
toolsMCP.name: FDA Product Label
toolsMCP.usage_hint: Use when you need specific FDA product label information for a drug, including clinical details, warnings, dosage, and contraindications.

toolsMCP.description:
Useful for when you need to perform following actions:
* finding a SMILES string of a molecule,
* finding the molecular weight of a chemical compound represented as SMILES,
* calculating molecular similarity between two molecules represented as SMILES,
* generating an image of a molecule,
* identifying functional groups in a molecule,
* finding CAS number of a chemical compound or a molecule,
* predicting the outcome of a chemical reaction between two molecules represented as smiles.
toolsMCP.name: Chemistry Helper
toolsMCP.usage_hint: Performs tasks across organic synthesis, drug discovery, and materials design via ChemCrow (ex: find the molecular weight of a chemical compound represented as SMILES, identify functional groups in a molecule, generate an image of it, etc.).

toolsMCP.description: Use this tool to query COLID (go/colid) documents in the Production environment using natural language. The catalog includes documents, ontologies, and scientific licenses from various domains such as clinical trials, BEAT, AWS Data Exchange, Bayer Veeva systems, real-world evidence data, and more.
toolsMCP.name: COLID Search - DEV
toolsMCP.usage_hint: Performs natural language searches on COLID documents via the OpenSearch API and also other natural language search using COLID genAssist

toolsMCP.description: Useful for when you need to find latest news updates from Hubble.
toolsMCP.name: Hubble News

toolsMCP.description: Used for RAG on MES (Manufacturing Execution System) data.
toolsMCP.name: MAIA MES Garbagnate RAG

toolsMCP.description: Generate high-quality videos from text prompts using Google Veo 3. Supports both single-scene videos and multi-scene vlogs with character consistency, cinematic production values, and automatic scene merging.
toolsMCP.name: Video Generator
toolsMCP.usage_hint: Create videos by describing scenes, characters, and actions. For single videos, provide a clear scene description with style preferences. For multi-scene vlogs, include character details and narrative concept. Supports cinematic styles, various camera angles, and automatic video merging.

toolsMCP.description: Core Operation Role Assistant
toolsMCP.name: CORA
toolsMCP.usage_hint: string

toolsMCP.description: BayerNet - Intranet information with internal articles and news. Based on the user query, it will find relevant Bayer internal content
toolsMCP.name: BayerNetMCP
toolsMCP.usage_hint: Use it for searching BayerNet content

toolsMCP.description: Validates AI-generated medical text against expert-composed inputs using the MedVAL-4B model. Evaluates factual consistency, identifies errors (hallucinations, omissions, certainty misalignments), and assigns a risk grade from 1 (No Risk) to 4 (High Risk).
toolsMCP.name: Medical Text Validator (MedVAL)
toolsMCP.usage_hint: Use this tool when you need to validate the quality and safety of AI-generated medical text. Provide the task instruction, the original expert input, and the AI-generated output. The tool will return a detailed assessment including reasoning, identified errors, and a risk level rating.

toolsMCP.description: Expert agent for comprehensive FDA drug information including product labels, regulatory data, approval status, Complete Response Letters, and safety information. Automatically searches multiple FDA databases to provide complete drug information.
toolsMCP.name: FDA Expert
toolsMCP.usage_hint: Use for comprehensive FDA drug information analysis. Automatically searches product labels, regulatory data, and Complete Response Letters to provide complete drug information.

toolsMCP.description: string
toolsMCP.name: CS MES Maia
toolsMCP.usage_hint: string

toolsMCP.description: LeanIX MCP
toolsMCP.name: LeanIX MCP
toolsMCP.usage_hint: string

toolsMCP.description: Useful for answering questions on data stored in data asset layer of the Regulatory Science department in CropScience. This warehouse stores data for the four business entities, PRODUCT, PIPELINE, STUDY and SUBMISSION, which represent the central data products the Regulatory Science department has to offer. In short, PRODUCT holds all data for seeds, traits and plant protection chemicals, PIPELINE holds all portfolio and execution level planning data for past, current and future activities in our product pipeline, STUDY holds metadata and results for studies performed to ensure safe usage of our products and SUBMISSION all data relevant for submissions made to authorities to register our products.
toolsMCP.name: RS Data
toolsMCP.usage_hint: Tool for accessing Reg180s

toolsMCP.description: CS MES tool
toolsMCP.name: CS MES Data Access
toolsMCP.usage_hint: string

toolsMCP.description: Self-service for eligible site energy managers for adding or removing sensors to/from a site in Bayer Energy Data Port or for viewing site information.
toolsMCP.name: Bayer Energy Data Port
toolsMCP.usage_hint: Performs tasks for managing the list of energy sensors at functional sites that are allowed to send data via Energy Data Port. E.g. Show all my sites and the sensors associated to them. Add sensor abc to site wup.

toolsMCP.description: Useful for when you need to create a PDF document.

toolsMCP.description: Use this tool for questions about local and regional market-specific insights, competitive intelligence like information about products, prices and pipelines of our competitors as well as research regarding our customer behaviors and interest in different markets, use market reports, primary and secondary market research, news, scientific publications, pipeline reports, dashboards in order to generate a comprehensive summary report in DeepSights showing detailed references and sources for your statements.
toolsMCP.name: QUEST/DeepSights
toolsMCP.usage_hint: Accesses insights on QUEST and creates a summary report based on your question via DeepSights API.

toolsMCP.description: Generate new images from text prompts or edit existing images. Can work with input images from attached files or chat history, supports mask-based editing.

toolsMCP.usage_hint: Create images from text descriptions or edit existing images. For editing, attach an image file or reference a previously generated image. Optionally attach a mask image for selective editing.

toolsMCP.name: Life sciences literature - PubMed
toolsMCP.usage_hint: Queries scientific publications relevant to your question in PubMed via Hubble Search.
